Subject: Berserk's old Habit
Message-ID: <8vri48+r1e8@...>

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: wilddance_mare@...

Berserk:



Berserk winced as the autoguns hit his shoulders and some on his 
back. He growled, baring his pure white teeth and turned to them. He 
let the connected chains on his clash sword go limp, to it's whip 
mode. He raised his arm and struck it at one. He turned and struck 
another off-line. 

They weren't all off-line. He withdrew his gun and fired at the rest, 
smashing the autoguns. He turned his head back to the hallway, where 
he saw Apocolypse. He growled down at him. He reverted his clash 
sword back to its tightly connected mode, where the bladed chains 
curved upward.

He snarled at him and charged.
